name: Sainte
description: Sainte transforms trauma into resilience through AI-driven, trauma-informed support, helping individuals stabilize, thrive, and break cycles of recidivism and stigma. Our scalable solutions serve underserved communities, employers, and healthcare providers, combining lived experiences with cutting-edge technology to build a resilient, inclusive society. Join us in creating systems that heal and empower.
one_liner: Sainte transforms trauma into resilience through AI-driven, trauma-informed support, helping individuals stabilize, thrive, and break cycles of recidivism and stigma. Our scalable solutions serve underserved communities, employers, and healthcare providers, combining lived experiences with cutting-edge technology to build a resilient, inclusive society. Join us in creating systems that heal and empower.
